data.title: Accounts Payable Automation for JD Edwards EnterpriseOne
data.meta_description: Automate the JD Edwards EnterpriseOne Accounts Payables process with Accounts Payable Automation for JD Edwards to free up time for things that actually matter.
data.text:
Get JD Edwards Ready for the Mandatory Digital Signature in Portugal from 2025

As of 31 December 2024, the qualified digital signature of invoices in PDF will be compulsory in Portugal. Article 182-A of the Portuguese Parliament extends the validity of PDF invoices until 31 December 2024.

Comments Off on Get JD Edwards Ready for the Mandatory Digital Signature in Portugal from 2025

Medinfar Group’s Journey with JD Edwards and Steltix

Medinfar Group's remarkable journey has been nothing short of inspiring. We had the opportunity to interview Ana Gomes, the company's Chief Financial Officer, who provided us with valuable insights into their operations.

Comments Off on Medinfar Group’s Journey with JD Edwards and Steltix

Accounts Payable Automation for JD Edwards Roadmap & Release Notes

APA releases continuous updates that include features, enhancements, and bug fixes for all its offerings. This article lists the latest release for each APA version and directs you to the documentation for those versions.

Comments Off on Accounts Payable Automation for JD Edwards Roadmap & Release Notes

Cool Tech has JD Edwards Users Excited and Delivering Serious Efficiencies to Businesses

Watch our webinar with the Oracle JD Edwards Product Development Team that focused on the latest innovations for JD Edwards, and how they can benefit businesses.

Comments Off on Cool Tech has JD Edwards Users Excited and Delivering Serious Efficiencies to Businesses

Steltix eInvoicing Series interview with the MBIE of New Zealand

Daniel Smith, Steltix APAC Managing Director sits down with Stu Ross, Manager Operations and Promotion, eInvoicing New Zealand Peppol Authority part of the New Zealand Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment (MBIE) to discuss this rising trend in New Zealand.

Comments Off on Steltix eInvoicing Series interview with the MBIE of New Zealand
